avanclain shrine.message:
Every New year event, Avanclain Shrine appears.
By paying 5 spina, you can have a buff for 90 minutes, which is removed when you disconnect or exit the game. or when 90 minutes is up.

Here are the buffs you can get:

I wanna increase my vitality!! = +100% MaxHp

I wanna improve my concentration!! = +100% MaxMp

I wanna be popular!! = +100% Aggro

I wanna win something!! = +100% Accuracy

I wanna avoid difficulties = +100% Dodge

I wanna be strong!! = +3% ATK and MATK

I wanna live a stable life!! = +10% Stability

I wanna act quickly!! = +1000 ASPD

I wanna speak more smoothly!! = +1000 CSPD

I want more experience!! =+10% EXP Gain

**YOU CAN ONLY GET 1 BUFF AT A TIME**

heart chocolates.message:
During the event period, you can create "Heart Chocolate" by collecting the "Red Wrapping Ribbons" obtainable from all monsters and bringing them to the synthesist.

"Heart Chocolate" has a healing effect and can also be used by the creator.

Furthermore, "Heart Chocolate" can be produced with Alchemy Skills.

If you trade "Heart Chocolate" during the event period with another adventurer, it will become an untradeable item and its HP healing effect will increase by 10 times.

Also, the name of the creator will be shown in the item description, making it a special gift that is just right for Valentine's Day

how to go to the event venue.message:
1. Go to any city: Sofya / El Scaro / Hora Diomedea
2. Click: Menu > Terminal > Go to Snowball Fight Venue

mechanics 1.message:
1. When you are in the venue, enter the portal to the arena.
2. Click Ready and wait for other participants.
(The party will be divided into 2 groups, the Red and Blue Teams. Each team has players in the range of 10 - 16 members, depending on the number of players participating.)
3. Shortcuts during the snowball fight:

mechanics 2.message:
4. Treasure boxes with random buffs will appear during the snowball fight. The buffs are down below image
5. Each snowball hit decreases HP. The team that manages to drain more opponent's HP during the specified time (depending on the number of participants), is entitled to win and get Points As well as: Box: Ice & Snow Bucket
6. Scoring system:
When your team loses: you get automatic 30 pts + (number of times you hit x 10)
When your team wins: you get automatic 100 pts + (number of times you hit x 10)

chapter 3: baterside in bloom?! (part 1.message:
While having fun sailing, you see a creature that looks like Viscum or Cerabes flying over your ship. but unfortunately the figure fled so quickly and we lost track. Because the ship is so big, you guys split up to find clues to where the figure escaped. There are 3 NPCs that will scatter, namely Sherry, Cersier, and Tenert. Then you have 3 chances to ask them about the figure's clue.

**There are 3 conditions when playing this minigame:**
1. (Win) If the clues of one of them help track the figure, then you will get prizes such as:
- Cherry Blossom Crystal/Sakuramochi/Toram Liquor/Tricolor Dango II

2. (Lose) If their hints don't help at all, then you'll be zoned out.

3. (Lose) If their clues find an intruder, you will go up to the roof of the ship and fight monsters.
To get to that figure, you are required to win at 3/3, even if you win at 1/3 and 2/3 but Lose at 3/3 then Tenert will get sick and you have to repeat from 1/3 again.

**CHAPTER FINAL MISSION**
- Defeat Deniala Lv 90

Reward: Cherry Blossom Crystal x1
( +1 for any hint that Win )

**NOTE:**
If you want to repeat the Waterside in Bloom Quest, you can skip the clue search scene but party leader shold have completed the puzzle and is in front of the boss

Golden Week is a series of four national holidays within a week in Japan. During this period, EXP Gain and Item Drop Rates will increase by 20% and we enjoy event activities as follows:
- Rakau Plains
- Yorl Highlands
- Darkanon Plain
- Wanderers' Plains
- Tolbas Grassland

You can hunt them fairly easily in parties to get apples, golden apples, and rare dyes for additional gear and armor.

june bride detail.message:
June Bride is an event where we get prizes when we party in pairs of different genders:

1. 20% EXP boost
2. When fighting a boss, you will get:
- Groom Box (when you use male chara)
- Bride box (when you use female chara)

**IMPORTANT NOTES:
1. Players will not get boxes if partying only with Pets and/or Mercenaries

2. All Groom and Bride Boxes obtained during the event will disappear after the event ends, so please open them before maintenance occurs

3. Not all Bosses can drop boxes.

4. There is no special boss in this event.**

about summer event.message:
Let the Fun Begin at the Summer Beach! Special Maps & Mini-Game "Diving" Appear!

Limited-edition beach maps to enjoy the heat of summer excitement to the fullest and "Diving", a special mini-game that can be played at the beach.

"Saltau's Beach", a limited-edition map with all the components of a perfect summer including white sand beach, blue sea, and even a beach house, has appeared!

You can go to Saltau's Beach from the wormhole in "Sofya City", "El Scaro", "Hora Diomedea", and "Draco Town".

about diving minigame.message:
You can challenge the mini-game "Diving" at Saltau's Beach.
Diving is a game to obtain "Fisherman Points" by attacking and defeating various monsters as you move around in the water.
"Gigantic Octopus Battle" and "Free-Diving" are the 2 types of game modes you can play

### Gigantic Octopus Battle
- In this mode, you team up with your friends to defeat "Gigantic Octopus". You may bring various diving items with you and get many Fisherman Points.
- You can create a room or join others room
- Please note that 1 Stamina from the player who created the room will be used when playing the challenge.
- The room creator in this mode can get more Fisherman Points when the battle against the Gigantic Octopus is completed

### How to Play Gigantic Octopus Battle
- You need to either create or join a room created by other players to play Gigantic Octopus Battle.
- There are 2 types of rooms, those that can be joined by anyone and those that can only be joined by friends, party or guild members, and acquaintances.
- The condition to join the room can also be changed after the diving game has started.
- To join a room created by other players, select one from the list. (Up to 15 rooms shown per condition)
- The rooms joined by your friends, guild or party members will be shown if you tap "For Acquaintances Only"

### Free-Diving
- You can swim freely in the ocean in this mode.
- You can't bring diving items with you, so you can't get many Fisherman Points. But you can enjoy diving without using any stamina.
- You will get used to the diving controls by playing in this mode.
- Let's Exchange Your Fisherman Points!
